title: Anysound
text: "Anysound" is a <a href="rock%20music">rock</a> song by <a href="The%20Vines%20%28band%29">The Vines</a> from their 2006 album "<a href="Vision%20Valley">Vision Valley</a>". The song's video, directed by <a href="Michel%20Gondry">Michel Gondry</a>, involves puppets. It was played in episode 21 in season 3 of "<a href="The%20O.C.">The O.C.</a>" It has also appeared in "".
